alert.note: Alert for Issaquena; Warren (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 5:20AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern East Carroll, northeastern Tensas, Madison and northeastern Franklin Parishes, central Warren and southwestern Issaquena Counties through 615 AM CDT... At 520 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Alsatia to near Tendal to near Bakers. Movement was southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Alsatia around 525 AM CDT. Sondheimer around 530 AM CDT. Tallulah, Omega and Mansford around 535 AM CDT. Eagle Bend around 540 AM CDT. Mound around 545 AM CDT. Somerset and Afton around 550 AM CDT. Newellton around 555 AM CDT. Vicksburg, Le Tourneau and Yokena around 600 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Delta and Richmond. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. High winds can bring down trees and large limbs resulting in serious injury or property damage. Exercise extreme caution when outdoors during such strong winds...and be especially aware of older trees. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 AM CDT for northeastern Louisiana.
